title: Pyravela Festivities
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship navigates Tollen's celebrations
summary: The fellowship arrives in Tollen, receiving and acting upon various messages.
Members engage in separate errands, gathering information about Ursk and networking.
They attend the Pyravela parade, depicting miracles of The Wyrdling.
At a street party, they discuss the acidic ooze and Ursk with locals.
They meet with playwright Thomas Hawke who shares a story possibly linked to their quest.
Preparations for their own Pyravela feast commence with a promising meeting with Umli.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship arrives in Tollen to partake in Pyravela festivities, while pursuing leads on their quest and preparing for their own feast.
